sharedRegions

Class ArrivalLounge

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.ArrivalLounge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ALPassenger, ALPorter

    public class ArrivalLounge
extends java.lang.Object
implements ALPassenger, ALPorter
    Implementation of the Arrival Lounge Shared Memory The passengers arrive here and get the whole airport moving.

    • Method Detail

      • takeABus

        public void takeABus()
        Description copied from interface: ALPassenger
        If the passenger journey hasn't ended, he takes a bus. This function makes sure he transits to the next state.
        Specified by:
        takeABus in interface ALPassenger

      • takeARest

        public boolean takeARest()
        Description copied from interface: ALPorter
        Wait until the last passenger to reach the arrival lounge do the operation what should i do. After carry all the bags for the appropriate store wait until the operation mentioned before from the next flight. If all the operations where done to all the flights, he finish running.
        Specified by:
        takeARest in interface ALPorter
        Returns:
        False if all the operations where done on all the flights. Otherwise True.

        public PassengerDecisions whatShouldIDo()
        Description copied from interface: ALPassenger

        Specified by:

      • isDayFinished

        public boolean isDayFinished()
        Checks if all the flights of the day have finished. This is given by comparing the current flight to the total number of flights and checking if it has finished.
        Returns:
        true if the flights have finished
